name: 7 Feet Heavy Duty Lathe Machine
description: Compact 7 ft heavy duty lathe designed for precision turning of medium-length components with reduced footprint and energy use.

name: Belt Driven Heavy Duty Lathe Machine
description: Industrial belt driven heavy duty lathe offering wide speed range and high torque for roughing and precision finishing of long shafts and flanges.

name: 10 Feet Heavy Duty Lathe Machine
description: 10 ft heavy duty lathe balancing rigidity and footprint for general workshop and maintenance turning tasks.

name: 10 Feet Belt Driven Extra Heavy Duty Lathe Machine
description: Belt driven extra heavy duty 10 ft lathe with enhanced swing and torque for tough roughing operations and large diameter workpieces.

name: 16 Feet Heavy Duty Lathe Machine
description: Long bed 16 ft heavy duty lathe suited for extended shaft and roller turning with consistent accuracy over length.

name: Manual Heavy Duty Lathe Machines
description: Manual control heavy duty lathe providing dependable performance for tool rooms and maintenance shops.

name: Extra Heavy Duty Lathe Machine
description: Extra heavy duty lathe engineered for large diameter, high mass workpieces requiring maximum rigidity and power.

name: Heavy Duty Lathe Machine
description: General purpose heavy duty lathe delivering reliability for continuous production turning operations.
